rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG, 50} owned by {50000567}

description: This unit helps students develop a critical understanding of the principles of competition law by comparing and contrasting approaches taken towards this field in jurisdictions such as the United States, United Kingdom, European Union and/or Australia. Topics examined will include mergers, abuse of market power, anti-competitive agreements, vertical restraints and sanctions
